pageProduct.name: Olay Eyes Pro-Retinol Anti-Ageing Eye Cream Treatment 15ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Eyes Pro-Retinol Anti-ageing Eye Treatment for deep wrinkles. Visibly reduces crow's feet & wrinkles - in just 4 weeks.

 - Formulated with Olay's best wrinkle-fighting ingredient, Retinyl Propionate. Alleviates deep wrinkles & crow's feet.


 - Reduces lines under eyes to maintain youthful vibrance.


 - Renews skin surface over time, reducing fine lines under eyes for brighter, healthier looking skin


 - Helps fortify the natural moisture barrier of your skin, allowing it to better retain moisture.


 - Dermatologically tested, also increases the rate of surface cell turnover to minimise wrinkles.


 - With its use, 78% women saw an improvement in just 4 weeks.*


Olay's best wrinkle-fighting ingredient is now in an eye cream! Olay Eyes Pro-Retinol Eye Treatment visibly reduces crow's feet & deep wrinkles in just 4 weeks. Formulated with Olay's best wrinkle-fighting ingredient: pro-retinol. It's gentler than other prescription retinoids and designed for the delicate skin around the eyes. Watch your crow's feet take flight with Pro-Retinol Eye Treatment.


 


*Based on wrinkle clinical study in Germany, 2008. Results may vary per individual.


 

Product Claims: deep wrinkles

Size: 15mL

KEY FEATURES

• Cleanse. Cleanse daily with an Olay Cleanser to remove impurities and make-up.
• Prepare. Apply Olay's lightweight essence and serum to help make skin receptive to anti-ageing ingredients.
• Treat - Eye. Apply Eye Treatment daily under eye area, paying special attention to wrinkles and crow's feet.
• Moisturise. Use with Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Day Cream during the day and Night Cream at night.
• Find out more at Olay.com.au

Warnings

Avoid use on eyelids and eye contact. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If skin irritation or sensitivity develops, reduce frequency or discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. Recommended for use with an SPF moisturiser.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate Dimethicone, Polyethylene, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isohexadecane, Retinyl Propionate, Cetyl Ricinoleate, DMDM Hydantoin, Carbomer, Carnosine, Polysorbate 80, PEG-100 Stearate, Polysorbate 20, Disodium EDTA, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, BHT, Butylene Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, BHT, Butylene Glycol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate.

Directions

Apply product daily, morning or evening, to under eye area and around crow's feet.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
